lines: Le monate letsatsi la ho ikhethela Mong a ka;
A pelo ee nyakaletseng, e bolele thabo ena.
Monate tsatsi lee Jesu a ntlhatsoitseng sebeng;
O nthutile ho rapela le ho phela ka nyakallo.
Le letle tsatsi lee Jesu a ntlhatsoitseng sebeng.
Ho felile ho phethiloe, ke oa Morena Ke oa ka,
O na mpitse ka latela ka thabela pitso eo.
U phomole pelo ea ka, nahana ka lintho tsena;
U se tlohe ho Morena, Eena ea ruileng molemo
